name: Spikes
effect: Sets up Spikes on the opponent's battlefield, which triggers every time a victim switches targets from the one they had on the previous turn. When triggered, they deal 1 dice of damage. Add 1 damage dice for every layer of spikes placed. Up to three layers can be placed. Has no effect on Flying types or Pokemon with the ability Levitate.
description: The pokemon sets up a layer of sharp caltrops on the field, serving as a sufficient trap to inhibit movement.
